levels.label: Combinatorics
levels.description: Dive into a strategy game of dynamics and arrangement to master the art of counting!

levels.label: Regression
levels.description: Step into a world of detective work to predict outcomes and unravel the mysteries behind data points!

levels.label: Bayesian Statistics
levels.description: Embark on an adventure where each clue and piece of evidence you gather helps refine your predictions!

levels.label: Linked Lists
levels.description: DIve into a story where you navigate through clingy nodes, mastering the art of manipulating data sequences!

levels.label: Binary Trees
levels.description: Explore the realm of nature and hierarchy, and learn how to structure data to enhance access!

levels.label: Biparite Graphs
levels.description: Challenge yourself in an intricate labyrinth and decipher complex relationships within datasets!

levels.label: Classes
levels.description: Step into the structural architect's shoes, where you design shape entities that evolve in a universe of your making!

levels.label: Polymorphism
levels.description: Master the arcane skill of puppetry by creating flexible and reusuable entities!

levels.label: Design Patterns
levels.description: Try your hand at elegant caligraphy via a codex of tried-and-tested strategies!

levels.label: Dijkstra's
levels.description: Set out on an interstellar quest, while conquering the shortest paths toward home!

levels.label: Kruskal's
levels.description: Traverse the art of connection, where you'll build bridges and unite scattered islands into a single landmass!

levels.label: NP-Completeness
levels.description: Enter the domain of unsolved mind games and challenge yourself at the limits of computation!

levels.label: Fibonacci Sequence
levels.description: Unravel the spirals of growth, where each step builds upon the last to master the power of addition!

levels.label: Memoization
levels.description: Reminisce forgotten magic to cast future spells more swifty!

levels.label: State Machine Optimization
levels.description: Step into your role as emperor of a warring nation, and lead your people to a quick victory!

levels.label: Decision Tree
levels.description: Embark on a quest of fortune telling, where each choice branhes your path toward prediction!

levels.label: Dimensionality Reduction
levels.description: Navigate vast, multidimensional landscapes with a magical compass that simplifies complexity!

levels.label: Neural Networks
levels.description: Harness the power of an enchanted peer network, where interconnected insights reveal the world's hidden patterns!
